column4: iv spent the last week reading faq's and the like and guides  i use my comp for entrtainment  and id really like to get back to my game,  im really sick of being pointed to cryptic guides and faq's that lis 3-5 diffrent ways of doing something  and no answer is really right except for whatever one works  and everyone i talked to about getting linus for my comp said Ubuntu is easy  well im not finding it so. im not a program
what are you doing that requires you to run off into faq-land?
if someone told you that you'd be gaming happily ever after on your linux machine I think they lied.. some games work some of the time.. most doesn't
if you're looking for something a bit more polished I'd recommend taking a look at the commercial versions.. cedega and others.. I think they are a bit easier to get started
they want money.. =) no other ways of paying?
